    • Uses of Serializable in net.kuujo.vertigo.context

      Classes in net.kuujo.vertigo.context that implement Serializable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComponentContext<T extends Component>
      A component context which contains information regarding each component instance within a single network component.
      class  InstanceContext<T extends Component>
      A component instance context which contains information regarding a specific component (module or verticle) instance within a network.
      class  NetworkContext
      A network context which contains information regarding the complete structure of a deployed network.

    • Uses of Serializable in net.kuujo.vertigo.input.grouping

      Subinterfaces of Serializable in net.kuujo.vertigo.input.grouping 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Grouping
      An input grouping.
      Classes in net.kuujo.vertigo.input.grouping that implement Serializable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllGrouping
      The all grouping dispatches messages to all instances of each component to which the component is connected.
      class  FieldsGrouping
      The fields grouping is a hashing based grouping.
      class  RandomGrouping
      The random grouping dispatches messages to component workers randomly.
      class  RoundGrouping
      The round grouping dispatches messages to workers in a round-robin fashion.
